GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 04-17.36N 007-04.00E AT 021815Z OCT.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS POSITION
   AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO
   MDAT-GOGC, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 092242Z OCT 17.
